title: The Company Data Domain Schema
description: Contains the public registered information about an entity

EntityId.title: Internal Id for entities
EntityId.description: Contains Axesor360 unique ID for the entity

VendorEntityId.title: Vendor Id for Entities
VendorEntityId.description: External Id (from vendors) for the entity

EntityName.title: Entity name
EntityName.description: Full name or business name of the entity

LastUpdate.title: Info about last update
LastUpdate.description: Date of last update of the date contained

PublicationsList.title: List of Publications
PublicationsList.description: List of publications or document filings concerning one or more events related to the entity

VendorReferenceId.title: Vendor Reference Id
VendorReferenceId.description: Internal vendor code thar references the specific publication

PublicationDate.title: Date of Publication
PublicationDate.description: Date of publication of the event in the original source

FilingDate.title: Date of Filing
FilingDate.description: Date of filing of the event in the register or similiar

FiledIn.title: Filed in
FiledIn.description: Place or administration where the events where filed

Source.title: Publication Source
Source.description: Source or media whereas the related event was published

FullText.title: Full detail of the event
FullText.description: Full text published on the original source
examples: Constitución. Comienzo de operaciones: 08-03-1996. Duración: INDEF. Objeto social: CONSULTORIA, SOPORTE, DESARROLLO, EXPLOTACION, DISTRIBUCION Y VENTA DE PRODUCTOS...

PublicationReference.title: Publication Reference code
PublicationReference.description: External code that unequivocal appoints to the event in the original source

PublicationName.title: Original name
PublicationName.description: Name of the entity in the moment of the event (could be different from the actual one)

PublicationURL.title: Publication URL
PublicationURL.description: Link (URI) to the original publication (pdf, image...)

DepositEnrollmentYear.title: Year of deposit or enrollment
DepositEnrollmentYear.description: Year of account deposit (Spain, Portugal...) or enrollment (Colombia)

EventsList.title: List of events
EventsList.description: List of different events related to the parent publication

Type.title: Publication related type
Type.description: Act or event type that describes the subject of the event published

TypeGroup.title: Publication related group type
TypeGroup.description: Parent group for act or event types that describes the subject of the event published

VendorTypeId.title: Vendor Type Id
VendorTypeId.description: Internal vendor code used to refer its specific act or event type

VendorTypeGroupId.title: Vendor Type Group Id
VendorTypeGroupId.description: Internal vendor code used to refer its specific act or event parent group type
